artist: Augustus Saint-Gaudens; Engraver: Charles Edward Barber
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. E. Cohen
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

URQ on front, in relief: [PLUS ULTRA / CHRISTOPHER / COLUMBUS / OCT. XII / MCCCCXCII]; on back, in relief: [WORLD'S COLUMBIA EXPOSITION / IN COMMEMORATION OF THE / FOUR HUNDREDTH ANNIVERSARY / OF THE LANDING OF COLUMBUS / MDCCCXCII - MDCCCXCIII / TO Mrs. E. COHEN]
signed: at bottom on front, in relief: [AUGUSTUS SAINT GAUDENS FECIT]; at bottom on back, incised: [C. E. BARBER FECIT]
title: Columbian Exposition medal
